QuestData.Title: Lunthistle's Tale
QuestData.Description: Will you assist me, mortal? Hear my tale.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Zamael Lunthistle at Firewatch Ridge in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.CompletionText: Allow me to finish my story.
QuestData.RewardText: I have accepted my fate here in this cage, but the prayer must be found.
